snippet: Former State Senator Robert Ford has been indicted on eight charges that include misconduct in office, forgery and ethics violations, state prosecutors said Friday.
abstract: South Carolina prosecutors say former State Sen Robert Ford has been indicted on eight charges that include misconduct in office, forgery and ethics violations; Ford also faces six Ethics Act violations.
lead_paragraph: Former State Senator Robert Ford has been indicted on eight charges that include misconduct in office, forgery and ethics violations, state prosecutors said Friday.

headline.main: South Carolina: Ex-lawmaker Robert Ford Faces Charges
